name: isothermal
content:
Add to word list

physics happening at or using a temperature that does not change: Heat for isothermal expansion can be harvested from water, air, or a source of waste heat such as a fuel-burning power plant. Directed motion is possible even in an isothermal system.
environment , geography relating to or involving isotherms (= lines drawn on weather maps joining all the places that have the same temperature): He suggested using isothermal lines as a way of comparing the climatic conditions of various countries. The cross-sectional and isothermal maps are just one of Humboldt's many achievements.
